qas.question: What is one of the longest free events in the streets?
How long can the nightly concerts run for?
What was a donkey hung from according to local legend?
How does the donkey piss on the crowd below?

context: <a0_0>Carnaval de Solsona<a0_0/> takes place in Solsona, Lleida. It is one of the longest; free events in the streets, and nightly concerts run for <a1_0>more than a week<a1_0/>. The Carnival is known for a legend that explains how a donkey was hung at <a2_0>the tower bell<a2_0/> − because the animal wanted to eat grass that grew on the top of the tower. To celebrate this legend, locals hang a stuffed donkey at the tower that "pisses" above the excited crowd using a <a3_0>water pump<a3_0/>. This event is the most important and takes place on Saturday night. For this reason, the inhabitants are called "matarrucs" ("<a4_0>donkey killers<a4_0/>").
